name: @lindemannrock/code-highlighter
description: Lightweight syntax highlighting for Craft CMS using Prism.js

scripts.minify: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.minify:css: cleancss -o src/resources/css/frontend.min.css src/resources/css/frontend.css && cleancss -o src/resources/css/field.min.css src/resources/css/field.css
scripts.minify:js: terser src/resources/js/field.js -o src/resources/js/field.min.js -c -m && terser src/resources/js/copy-button.js -o src/resources/js/copy-button.min.js -c -m
